argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | tglngval.p | |- P = ( Base ` G ) |
| 2 |  | tglngval.l | |- L = ( LineG ` G ) |
| 3 |  | tglngval.i | |- I = ( Itv ` G ) |
| 4 |  | tglngval.g | |- ( ph -> G e. TarskiG ) |
| 5 |  | tglngval.x | |- ( ph -> X e. P ) |
| 6 |  | tglngval.y | |- ( ph -> Y e. P ) |
| 7 |  | tgcolg.z | |- ( ph -> Z e. P ) |
| 8 |  | lnxfr.r | |- .~ = ( cgrG ` G ) |
| 9 |  | lnxfr.a | |- ( ph -> A e. P ) |
| 10 |  | lnxfr.b | |- ( ph -> B e. P ) |
| 11 |  | lnxfr.d | |- .- = ( dist ` G ) |
| 12 |  | lnid.1 | |- ( ph -> X =/= Y ) |
| 13 |  | lnid.2 | |- ( ph -> ( Y e. ( X L Z ) \/ X = Z ) ) |
| 14 |  | lnid.3 | |- ( ph -> ( X .- Z ) = ( X .- A ) ) |
| 15 |  | lnid.4 | |- ( ph -> ( Y .- Z ) = ( Y .- A ) ) |
| 16 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 7, 9, 11, 12, 13, 14, 15 | #P_lncgr | |- ( ph -> ( Z .- Z ) = ( Z .- A ) ) |
| 17 | 16 | #P_eqcomd | |- ( ph -> ( Z .- A ) = ( Z .- Z ) ) |
| 18 | 1, 11, 3, 4, 7, 9, 7, 17 | #P_axtgcgrid | |- ( ph -> Z = A ) |
